name: Diamonds in the Rough (itch)
description:
"Diamonds in the Rough" is a chaotic card game that pits you against the deadliest forces of nature (snakes and bombs) in a mad-grab for precious treasure (diamonds). Snatch up as many diamonds as you can before the bombs destroy them, but don't be too hasty - those snakes definitely bite!

Submission for Ludum Dare 49 https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49
